item.title: 预计日本央行银行间金融市场调查将显示大型制造商情绪稳定：路透调查
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，截至 9 月份的三个月中，日本大型制造商的商业景气可能保持稳定，而非制造商的信心则略有减弱，这反映出人们对全球经济放缓的担忧。【原文：Japanese big manufacturers' business sentiment likely stayed steady in the three months to September, while non-manufacturers' confidence weakened slightly, a Reuters poll showed on Friday, reflecting concerns over the global economic slowdown.】

item.title: 投资者避开欧洲汽车股，尽管估值已跌至谷底
item.description: 欧洲汽车股目前很不受欢迎，即使该行业问题的严重性已导致估值接近历史最低点，投资者仍在不断减少投资，而这通常会极大地刺激潜在买家。【原文：European auto stocks are so unpopular right now that investors keep reducing their exposure even as the scale of the industry's problems has driven valuations close to record lows, which would normally be a big incentive for would-be buyers.】

item.title: 新工厂投产，全球炼油厂利润下滑
item.description: 亚洲、欧洲和美国的炼油企业正面临着利润率降至多年来最低点的局面，这标志着这个在大流行病后回报率飙升的行业出现了下滑，也凸显了当前全球需求放缓的程度。【原文：Oil refiners in Asia, Europe and the United States are facing a drop in profitability to multi-year lows, marking a downturn for an industry that had enjoyed surging returns post-pandemic and underlining the extent of the current slowdown in global demand.】

item.title: 降息即将到来，但美国股市可能已经对降息做出了定价
item.description: 随着美联储启动期待已久的降息周期，一些投资者担心，估值高企的美股可能已经对宽松货币政策的好处进行了定价，从而使市场难以进一步上涨。【原文：As the Federal Reserve kicks off a long-awaited rate cutting cycle, some investors are wary that richly valued U.S. stocks may have already priced in the benefits of easier monetary policy, making it harder for markets to rise much further.】

item.title: 早间竞价：让日元成为焦点
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 耐克下一任首席执行官希尔带来了一种自力更生的心态
item.description: 埃利奥特-希尔于 1988 年作为实习生进入耐克公司工作，但他凭借自己在得克萨斯州一个工人家庭中作为单亲母亲的儿子所养成的坚韧不拔和勤奋工作的价值观，稳步晋升。【原文：Elliott Hill started at Nike as an intern in 1988 but steadily scaled its ranks, banking on values of grit and hard work ingrained in him as the son of a single mom in a working class Texas neighborhood.】

item.title: 婴儿减少、经济放缓导致需求下降，中国奶牛场奶水不足
item.description: 随着出生率的下降和消费者成本意识的增强，即使近年来奶牛场不断扩大，中国对牛奶的需求也在减少，这迫使小型奶农倒闭，挤压了中国这个世界第一大进口国的牛奶供应量。【原文：China is awash in unwanted milk as falling birth rates and cost-conscious consumers have cut demand even as dairy farms expanded in recent years, forcing smaller farmers out of business and squeezing shipments into the world's top importer.】

item.title: 日本央行维持利率稳定，坚持乐观的经济观点
item.description: 日本央行周五维持利率稳定，并坚持认为经济仍处于温和复苏的轨道上。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept interest rates steady on Friday and maintained its view the economy remained on track for a moderate recovery.】

item.title: 亚洲股市沐浴美联储余辉，日元在日本央行会议前惴惴不安
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市延续涨势，沐浴在美国大幅降息的余晖中，而日元则在日本货币政策决定出台前表现不安，交易商在寻找未来紧缩政策的线索。【原文：Asian shares extended their rally on Friday, bathing in the afterglow of an outsized interest rate cut in the United States, while the yen was jittery ahead of a monetary policy decision in Japan as traders look for clues about future tightening.】

item.title: 中国出人意料地保持贷款利率稳定，市场预期很快降息
item.description: 中国在周五的月度定盘会上意外地维持基准贷款利率不变，打破了美联储本周早些时候大幅降息后市场对中国降息的预期。【原文：China unexpectedly left benchmark lending rates unchanged at the monthly fixing on Friday, confounding market expectations that were primed for a move after the Federal Reserve delivered an outsized interest rate cut earlier this week.】

item.title: 美国降息后油价本周收盘将走高
item.description: 周五亚市早盘，油价变化不大，在美国大幅降息和全球库存下降之后，油价有望连续第二周收高。【原文：Oil prices, which were little changed in early Asian trade on Friday, were on track to end higher for a second straight week following a large cut in U.S. interest rates and declining global stockpiles.】

item.title: 日本央行召开会议，日元止跌回升，美元受利率前景影响
item.description: 周五，日元继续承压，因为投资者押注日本央行（BOJ）将在政策会议结束时对进一步收紧政策持谨慎态度，而美元也有自己的问题，因为市场预计美国将更快地降息。【原文：The yen remained under pressure on Friday as investors wagered the Bank of Japan (BOJ) would wrap up a policy meeting sounding cautious on further tightening, while the U.S. dollar had its own problems as markets priced in more rapid U.S. rate cuts.】

item.title: 华为价值 2800 美元的三折手机在供应担忧中上市
item.description: 华为和苹果的最新智能手机将于本周五在中国上市，中国科技公司备受期待的 2800 美元三折手机的售价是 iPhone 16 Pro Max 的两倍多。【原文：Huawei and Apple’s latest smartphones go on sale in China on Friday, with the Chinese tech company’s much-anticipated $2,800 tri-foldable phone offered at more than twice the price of the iPhone 16 Pro Max.】

item.title: 华特迪士尼任命《莫阿娜》编剧贾里德-布什为动画工作室创意总监
item.description: 华特迪士尼动画工作室（Walt Disney Animation Studios）领导层发生重大调整，周四任命奥斯卡获奖电影制片人贾里德-布什（Jared Bush）为新任首席创意官，即日起生效。【原文：Walt Disney Animation Studios, in a significant leadership shift, on Thursday named Academy Award-winning filmmaker Jared Bush as its new chief creative officer, effective immediately.】

item.title: 路透社调查：澳大利亚央行将在 9 月 24 日维持利率稳定，并在 2025 年第一季度降息
item.description: 据路透社调查的经济学家称，澳大利亚央行将在周二和今年下半年维持关键政策利率不变，因为物价压力增大，大多数经济学家预计明年初将首次降低利率。【原文：Australia's central bank will keep its key policy interest rate unchanged on Tuesday and for the rest of the year amid elevated price pressures, according to economists polled by Reuters, with most expecting the first reduction early next year.】

item.title: 梅西百货为假日季招聘 31500 多名员工
item.description: 梅西百货公司（Macy's）周四表示，该公司将为即将到来的假日季招聘 31500 多名全职和兼职员工，人数少于去年，因为这家美国百货公司正在为繁忙的购物季做准备。【原文：Macy's said on Thursday it will hire more than 31,500 full and part-time employees for the upcoming holiday season - fewer than last year - as the U.S. department store gears up for a busy shopping period.】

item.title: 美国贸易代表办公室就中国多晶硅、硅片和钨的关税上调征求意见
item.description: 美国贸易代表办公室周四表示，将从下周一开始就对中国多晶硅、硅片和钨产品大幅提高关税的计划接受公众意见。【原文：The U.S. Trade Representative's office said on Thursday it will accept public comments starting on Monday on its plans for steep tariff increases on Chinese polysilicon, silicon wafers and tungsten products.】

item.title: 好时公司本周裁员
item.description: 好时公司发言人周四表示，该巧克力制造商本周裁减了少量员工，这是公司今年早些时候宣布的组织变革的一部分，当时可可价格创下历史新高。【原文：A spokesperson for Hershey said on Thursday the chocolate maker laid off a small number of its employees this week as part of organizational changes the company announced earlier this year when cocoa prices reached record highs.】

item.title: 摩根大通任命医疗保健和科技投行业务主管
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通周四宣布了领导层变动，以加强其医疗保健和技术投资银行业务。【原文：JPMorgan Chase announced on Thursday leadership changes in a push to strengthen its healthcare and technology investment banking, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 早间竞标央行接力棒传给日本和中国
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美联储大幅减息引发混乱，全球投资者为动荡做好准备
item.description: 在美国大幅降息引发全球主要经济体是将走向繁荣还是面临衰退的困惑之后，全球大型投资者都在警惕市场的剧烈波动，这使得全球股市、债券和货币的前景变得扑朔迷离。【原文：Big global investors are on alert for wild market swings after a jumbo U.S. rate cut sparked confusion over whether the world's dominant economy is set to boom or face recession, muddling prospects for stocks, bonds and currencies worldwide.】

item.title: 航空公司高管 Farhad Azima 就黑客攻击索赔与律师事务所 Dechert 达成和解
item.description: 总部位于密苏里州的航空公司高管法尔哈德-阿兹玛（Farhad Azima）周四表示，他已与律师事务所德赫特（Dechert）及其两名前高级律师达成和解，他们被指控参与了黑客攻击他的电子邮件并在法庭上利用这些电子邮件破坏他的生意的计划。【原文：Missouri-based airline executive Farhad Azima said on Thursday he had settled with the law firm Dechert and two of its former senior attorneys over allegations they took part in a scheme to hack his emails and use them in court to destroy his business.】

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会主席拒绝特朗普就总统辩论撤消 ABC 许可证的呼吁
item.description: 美国联邦通信委员会主席拒绝了美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普的建议，即华特-迪斯尼旗下的美国广播公司（ABC）应因主持 9 月 10 日的总统辩论而失去广播许可证。【原文：The chair of the Federal Communications Commission rejected former U.S. President Donald Trump's suggestion that Walt Disney-owned ABC should lose its broadcast licenses over the network's moderating Sept. 10 presidential debate.】

item.title: 日本央行将保持政策稳定，发出更多加息信号
item.description: 日本央行周五将维持货币政策稳定，但同时表示相信稳健的工资增长和消费将使央行在未来几个月再次加息。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to keep monetary policy steady on Friday, but signal its confidence that solid wage growth and consumption will allow the central bank to raise interest rates again in coming months.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商 Lennar 第三季度利润增长，原因是房屋交付量增加
item.description: 莱纳尔公司周四公布的第三季度利润高于去年同期，原因是住房供应量处于历史低位，需求保持强劲，固定抵押贷款利率下降吸引了更多谨慎的购房者入市。【原文：Lennar Corp posted a higher third-quarter profit on Thursday, compared with a year earlier, as a historically low housing supply kept demand strong, with declining fixed mortgage rates luring in more skittish buyers to the market.】

item.title: 调查显示，万圣节购物者提前抢购，而总支出却有所减少
item.description: 美国全国零售联合会（NRF）周四公布的数据显示，尽管总体消费额比去年创下的最高纪录有所下降，但消费者早在今年10月之前就开始利用特殊活动购买万圣节装饰和服装。【原文：Consumers started shopping for Halloween decor and costumes well before October this year, taking advantage of special events, even though overall spending has decreased from last year's record high, data from the National Retail Federation (NRF) showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 耐克任命埃利奥特-希尔为新任首席执行官；约翰-多纳霍将退休
item.description: 耐克公司周四表示，公司首席执行官约翰-多纳霍（John Donahoe）将在执掌公司五年多后退休。【原文：Nike said on Thursday that CEO John Donahoe will retire after more than five years at the helm as the sportswear giant shakes up its top rank amid efforts to revive sales and battle rising competition.】

item.title: 美联储大幅降息的决定可能比唯一的反对意见所显示的更为接近
item.description: 美联储周三大张旗鼓地启动了今年和明年更多的降息行动，但从央行19位政策制定者对利率路径的预测来看，这一行动可能只得到了微弱多数的全力支持。【原文：The Federal Reserve's big bang start on Wednesday to what's expected to be more interest-rate cuts this year and next may have had the full support of only a slim majority of the central bank's 19 policymakers, a look at their rate-path projections suggests.】

item.title: 联邦快递公布季度盈利下降，原因是优先服务需求下降
item.description: 联邦快递周四公布第一季度利润下降，并下调了全年利润预期的上限，原因是包裹业的需求依然低迷，尤其是对优先服务的需求。【原文：FedEx reported a drop in first-quarter profit on Thursday and lowered the top end of its annual profit forecast as demand in the package industry remained muted, especially for priority services.】

item.title: 达美航空公司将暂停纽约与特拉维夫之间的航班
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周四表示，由于中东地区的安全问题不断升级，该公司将暂停纽约-肯尼迪机场与特拉维夫之间的航班，直至 12 月 31 日。【原文：Delta Air Lines said on Thursday it will pause its flights between New York-JFK and Tel Aviv through Dec. 31, due to escalating security concerns in the Middle East.】
